name: microfarm-monorepo
description: Isometric farming simulation game with TypeScript backend and frontend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter=@microfarm/shared run build && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/backend run build && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/frontend run build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter=@microfarm/shared run test && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/backend run test && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/frontend run test
scripts.test:watch: pnpm --filter=@microfarm/shared run test:watch && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/backend run test:watch && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/frontend run test:watch
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter=@microfarm/shared run test:coverage && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/backend run test:coverage && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/frontend run test:coverage
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter=@microfarm/shared run lint && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/backend run lint && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/frontend run lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter=@microfarm/shared run clean && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/backend run clean && pnpm --filter=@microfarm/frontend run clean && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.ci: pnpm run audit && pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run test && pnpm run build
